Start with a warmup Exercise lightly: you should be able to talk while you warmup Go as hard as you can to sustain the whole time. You can do this! Exercise lightly: steady your heartbeat without stopping Breathe, go at slow and relaxed pace that allows you to calm down your heartrate but don\'t stop now Congratulations!
